::DevilDuer/Squizzy::

DevilDuer leans up agains the doorframe, watching Squizzy and Vamprah.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"You mean a spark transplant into an external container?" She 
frowns, "Not many, but some."

She smiles at Vamprah. "You want your spark extracted for any reason?"





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
wrote:
> Vamprah::
> 
> "Well" said Vamprah "I like to ask you something before Squizzy, 
how 
> many sparks have you put inside a container?"
